attributes.action: Reverse the Decision to freeze the Student loan repayment threshold at £21,000
attributes.additional_details:
for more information you can visit http://www.bbc.co.uk/newsbeat/article/34920886/spending-review-student-loan-repayments-explained
or
http://www.theguardian.com/money/2015/nov/25/student-loans-george-osborne-criticised-freezing-repayment-threshold

Thanks 
Daniel Wilson
attributes.background: George Osborne, in the autumn statement has chosen to freeze the student loan repayment threshold at £21,000 until 2020-21. This change to the terms and conditions after the start of the loan wouldn't be allowed by a commercial bank and will lead to higher repayments for students in the future.
